item.title: Get voice search on your older iOS devices (iPad 1, iPhone 4, iPod Touch, etc.) with Google Search
item.description:
Do you have a iOS device that doesn't have Siri? Are you feeling lonely and would like to talk to your device? Maybe Google Search is what you need.

Once you install it, you can ask Google questions, like "Is it going to rain tonight?" or "What time do the â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
